issues.description: The problem specification and UML diagram state that the abstract method messageOnFeed() should return a String, but in the solution repository Animal.java defines messageOnFeed() to return a FeedResponse. This return‚Äêtype change conflicts with the intended design and makes the Goat class override (returning String) invalid and causes compilation errors.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the return type of messageOnFeed() across all artifacts by changing Animal.messageOnFeed() to return String (and remove or refactor FeedResponse), so that subclasses implement messageOnFeed(): String as specified.
